Uses of Class
nl.inl.blacklab.exceptions.ErrorOpeningIndex

  • Packages that use ErrorOpeningIndex 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.contentstore
    Deals with storing the original content in UTF-16 for quickly making concordances.
    nl.inl.blacklab.exceptions  
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.testutil
    Package for test applications, for example doing performance testing on the different parts of BlackLab, and tools that can help with debugging problems.
    nl.inl.blacklab.tools
    Package for tool applications.
